subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: In a game with conference title implications, No. 7 South Carolina, coached by Steve Spurrier, will face off against Florida on Saturday, the team Spurrier once led to a national championship.
snippet: In a game with conference title implications, No. 7 South Carolina, coached by Steve Spurrier, will face off against Florida on Saturday, the team Spurrier once led to a national championship.
